nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member regional stats is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member output occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Interval that determines frequency of computation for the regional stats analysis member.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the regional stats analysis member will operate on that contains the list of input fields (and will be modified to contain the output stats fields).
nml_option.possible_values: An existing output stream that will be read for input fields. Cannot be 'none', like other analysis members.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the regional stats analysis member will use for the mask/region data.
nml_option.possible_values: An existing input stream that will be read for regions/masks. Cannot be 'none', like other analysis members, and should be the same as input_stream to ensure the masks are read on start or restart.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_input_stream
nml_option.description: Name of stream the regional stats analysis member will use for the mask/region data.
nml_option.possible_values: An existing input stream that will be read for regions/masks. Cannot be 'none', like other analysis members, and should be the same as restart_stream to ensure the masks are read on start or restart.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_operation
nml_option.description: An operation describing the statistic to apply to all variables in the output stream.
nml_option.possible_values: An operation, where it can be 'avg', 'min', or 'max'.

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_region_type
nml_option.description: The reduced dimension of the region masks that will be used during the regional stats operation. Needs to be the last dimension, and the same dimension as all of the reduced fields, weight fields, and masks.
nml_option.possible_values: The mask reduction dimension, where it can be 'cell' or 'vertex'

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_region_group
nml_option.description: The name of the group of region masks that will be used to subset the mesh during the regional stats operation.
nml_option.possible_values: a valid name in the region group names

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_1d_weighting_function
nml_option.description: An operation applied to every element in a region WITHOUT a vertical dimension, with a 1D weighting field, prior to an average operation. The average is normalized by the sum of the weight field in the region (divided by the sum of regional weight values).
nml_option.possible_values: A weight operation, where it can be 'id' (for 'min', 'max', or 'avg') or 'mul' (where 'mul' is restricted to 'avg').

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_2d_weighting_function
nml_option.description: An operation applied to every element in a region WITH a vertical dimension, with a 2D weighting field, prior to an average operation. The average is normalized by the sum of the weight field in the region (divided by the sum of regional weight values).
nml_option.possible_values: A weight operation, where it can be 'id' (for 'min', 'max', or 'avg') or 'mul' (where 'mul' is restricted to 'avg').

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_1d_weighting_field
nml_option.description: A 1D real field used in conjunction with the 1D weighting function, to be used as a weighting scale factor (like area).
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' if 1D weighting function is 'id', otherwise any valid 1D real field with the same horizontal dimensions as the region masks

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_2d_weighting_field
nml_option.description: A 2D real field used in conjunction with the 2D weighting function, to be used as a weighting scale factor (like area).
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' if weighting function is 'id', otherwise any valid 2D real field with the same horizontal dimensions as the region masks and the vertical mask (requires that there is a vertical mask and vertical dimension)

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_vertical_mask
nml_option.description: An additional 2D vertical integer mask field, which is used in conjunction with the regional masks. Used in cases when an input field has a second dimension that matches the vertical mask dimension.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' if no vertical mask field is to be used, otherwise any integer 2D field with the configured second vertical dimension

nml_option.name: config_AM_regionalStatsDaily_vertical_dimension
nml_option.description: The second dimension to be used for additional vertical mask.
nml_option.possible_values: 'none' if no vertical mask field is to be used, otherwise the name of the second dimension in the vertical mask field (where the first has to be the element dimension)
